sources.title: The Fast And The Furious
sources.description: http://imdb.com/title/tt0046969/ A man wrongly imprisoned for murder (John Ireland) breaks out of jail. He wants to clear his name, but with the police pursuing him, he's forced to take a beautiful young woman, driving a fast sports car, hostage and slip into a cross-border sports car race to try to make it to Mexico before the police get him

sources.title: The Fast and the Furious
sources.description: NOTE: THIS FILM IS SEPARATED INTO FOUR FILES The Fast and the Furious, DVD quality here, available in lower resolution here: http://www.archive.org/details/TheFastandtheFuriousJohnIreland1954goofyrip The film is ripped from the "Digiview Productions" DVD, the first three files are direct rips with '.vob' renamed to '.mpg' without reformatting, while the fourth file (part 4 of 4) was reformatted to remove copyrighted logos of the distributer which followed. For more information on public domain films, where to watch them, where to download them, and legal status info, visit http://www.publicdomainmotionpictures.com

sources.title: The Fast and the Furious (1954)
sources.description: A man wrongly imprisoned for murder breaks out of jail. He wants to clear his name, but with the police pursuing him, he's forced to take a beautiful young woman, driving a fast sports car, hostage and slip into a cross-border sports car race to try to make it to Mexico before the police get him. sources.title: The Fast and The Furious (1955) ROGER CORMAN
sources.description:
Movie Class by PizzaFLIX: Legendary cult filmmaker Roger Corman has directed
over 50 films and produced nearly 400 more. In the process he helped launch the careers
of Jack Nicholson, Robert De Niro, Charles Bronson, Sylvester Stallone, Francis Ford Coppola, Martin Scorsese, Ron Howard, Robert Towne, Peter Bogdanovich, and James Cameron!

Stars: John Ireland, Dorothy Malone and Bruce Carlisle
Directors: John Ireland, Edward Sampson

A man wrongly imprisoned for murder breaks out of jail. He wants to clear his name, but with the police pursuing him.

sources.title: The Fast And The Furious ( 1955)
sources.description: A framed man escapes prison and takes a rich woman's Jaguar with her in it. After she tries to escape numerous times they soon develop feelings for each other, and enters a road race that ends in Mexico.

sources.title: BOOTLEGGER'S DRIVE-IN SATURDAY NIGHT: THE FAST AND THE FURIOUS & SHAME
sources.description: A COMPLETE DVD. Features a custom menu with poster art or a still photo from one of the movies and drive in style audio. Burning is super easy. Download the zipped folder, open it, extract the VIDEO TS folder, and burn to disc, that's the easiest way. I've also uploaded the files outside the .zip so they can be viewed here on this site. This dvd features another Roger Corman double-bill (and there's going to be a few more) THE FAST AND THE FURIOUS & SHAME plus the preview and intermission reels.

metadata.Plot: A man wrongly imprisoned for murder breaks out of jail. He wants to clear his name, but with the police pursuing him, he's forced to take a beautiful young woman, driving a fast sports car, hostage and slip into a cross-border sports car race to try to make it to Mexico before the police get him.
metadata.Writer: Jerome Odlum, Jean Howell, Roger Corman
metadata.Actors: John Ireland, Dorothy Malone, Bruce Carlisle
